sentences.en: Those who survive are at greater risk of developing brittle bones, life-threatening infections, kidney damage and heart problems.
sentences.cn: 那些存活下来的人面临着更大的风险，如骨头变脆，威胁生命的感染，肾脏损害以及心脏问题。

sentences.en: His heart condition is not life-threatening.
sentences.cn: 他的心脏病不会危及生命。

sentences.en: Scalds, burns and poisoning can all be life-threatening.
sentences.cn: 烫伤、烧伤和中毒都有可能危及生命。
